solution:
```python
import math

def calculate_distance(x1, y1, x2, y2):
    return math.sqrt((x2 - x1) ** 2 + (y2 - y1) ** 2)

def calculate_height(x0, y0, x1, y1, x2, y2, xa, ya, xb, yb, xc, yc):
    d01 = calculate_distance(x0, y0, x1, y1)
    d12 = calculate_distance(x1, y1, x2, y2)
    d02 = calculate_distance(x0, y0, x2, y2)
    d0a = calculate_distance(x0, y0, xa, ya)
    d1b = calculate_distance(x1, y1, xb, yb)
    d2c = calculate_distance(x2, y2, xc, yc)
    return min(abs(d01 - d02), abs(d01 - d12), abs(d02 - d12)) / 2

def solve_problem():
    while True:
        x0, y0, x1, y1, x2, y2 = map(int, input().split())
        if x0 == 0 and y0 == 0 and x1 == 0 and y1 == 0 and x2 == 0 and y2 == 0:
            break
        for xa in range(-100, 101):
            for ya in range(-100, 101):
                for xb in range(-100, 101):
                    for yb in range(-100, 101):
                        for xc in range(-100, 101):
                            for yc in range(-100, 101):
                                if (xa, ya) not in [(x0, y0), (x1, y1), (x2, y2)] and \
                                   (xb, yb) not in [(x0, y0), (x1, y1), (x2, y2)] and \
                                   (xc, yc) not in [(x0, y0), (x1, y1), (x2, y2)] and \
                                   (xa, ya) != (xb, yb) and (xb, yb) != (xc, yc) and (xc, yc) != (xa, ya):
                                    d01 = calculate_distance(x0, y0, x1, y1)
                                    d12 = calculate_distance(x1, y1, x2, y2)
                                    d02 = calculate_distance(x0, y0, x2, y2)
                                    d0a = calculate_distance(x0, y0, xa, ya)
                                    d1b = calculate_distance(x1, y1, xb, yb)
                                    d2c = calculate_distance(x2, y2, xc, yc)
                                    if d01 != d02 and d01 != d12 and d02 != d12 and \
                                       d0a != d01 and d0a != d02 and d0a != d12 and \
                                       d1b != d01 and d1b != d02 and d1b != d12 and \
                                       d2c != d01 and d2c != d02 and d2c != d12:
                                        height = calculate_height(x0, y0, x1, y1, x2, y2, xa, ya, xb, yb, xc, yc)
                                        if height > 0:
                                            print(height)
                                            return
        print(-1)

solve_problem()
```
